onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} met his mother’s gaze, his decision firm despite the ache in his chest. “I am certain, Mother. I must know who I am and where I came from. If I am to serve this kingdom, I must first understand the truth of my own blood.”

His words hung in the air, steady and unyielding.

The Queen of {Kingdom#Name} regarded him for a long moment before a faint, sorrowful smile graced her lips.

“Then go, my son,” she said softly. “Seek your answers, and may they lead you home again.” She rose and placed a gentle hand upon his cheek. “Your father and I will endure, so that when you return, your kingdom, and our love, will still be here waiting.”

With the new day’s dawn, {Player} readies himself for the long journey ahead, first he needed to know more of his discovery, who better after his mother other than the Royal Historian or the Captain of the Royal Guard.
choices: Talk to the Captain of the Royal Guard
